changeSet.sql:
create table ${schemaName}.movements ( id bigserial, patient_id bigint not null, company_id bigint not null, sector_id bigint not null, stock_id bigint not null, registration_date Date not null,
constraint pk_movements primary key(id), constraint fk_patients foreign key(patient_id) references dbapatient.patients(id), constraint fk_companies foreign key(company_id) references dbapatient.companies(id), constraint fk_sectors foreign key(sector_id) references dbapatient.sectors(id), constraint fk_stocks foreign key(stock_id) references dbapatient.stocks(id) );
